attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to try and save our village school and keep it in our community for the residential children of the village and for any new comers whom wish to live here.

This peaceful village has had Portknockie Primary School part of it for many years and dates go back to 1900's and has had many generations of pupils from all over the world.

All residents of Portknockie are desperate for the school to remain open as each and every one of the pupils love the education being taught and without it would mean a whole new begining for both pupils and parents/gaurdians.

To close Portknockie Primary School would be an absolute devastation not only would it affect the pupils, teacher, etc. it would have a major impact on the population of the village itself due to no education being taught at all in the village.

Please lets all stand together and do what is right for our children and generations to come and SAVE OUR SCHOOL!

Please do your part and sign this petition.
